NCE is offering an exciting new opportunity for attending one of our great professional development events:

2017 Summer Leadership Institute, St. Louis, MO – July 24-26, 2017
2017 Professional Development Seminar, San Diego, CA – November 1-2, 2017

If you work for a chapter of The Arc and have never attended one of our events before, you are eligible to win a scholarship. Scholarships cover the registration fee and attendance at a social event. Visit the 2017 NCE Scholarship Application to learn more and apply! The deadline is March 3, 2017.
